entity.name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders
entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text:
@PressSec Former republican presidential candidate, Herman Cain, diagnosed with COVID-19 nine days after appearing at Trump's Tulsa, OK rally, has died. Cain was photographed at the rally not wearing a mask, where social distancing wasn't being practiced.

https://t.co/57pgFG8gug
